title: [Abbey, Library]
[Abbey Library]
description: Dark shelves line the walls, crowded with leather-bound volumes and racks full of painstakingly preserved scrolls.  A gleaming marble fireplace adorns the far wall of the cozy chamber, its tall plaster hood tapering gracefully into a spear-shaped point near the ceiling.  Tall mullioned windows permit moonlight into the room from the darkened landscape outside.

Dark shelves line the walls, crowded with leather-bound volumes and racks full of painstakingly preserved scrolls.  A gleaming marble fireplace adorns the far wall of the cozy chamber, its tall plaster hood tapering gracefully into a spear-shaped point near the ceiling.  Tall mullioned windows allow daylight into the room from the snow-covered landscape outside.

Dark shelves line the walls, filled with crumbling leather-bound volumes and scrolls.  A small fireplace stands at the far end of the room, its tall, plaster hood tapering gracefully into a spear-shaped point near the ceiling.  Tall mullioned windows reflect light into the room from the snow-covered landscape outside.

Dark shelves line the walls, filled with crumbling leather-bound volumes and scrolls.  A small fireplace stands at the far end of the room, its tall, plaster hood tapering gracefully into a spear-shaped point near the ceiling.  Tall mullioned windows reflect moonlight into the room from the snow-covered landscape outside.
